title: Oh, mrs eaves.
content:
i'd like to take this opportunity to introduce myself, as i just discovered this website this weekend, and i'm amazed i hadn't sooner.   
i love typography, but i definitely can't flatter myself to say i know even a quarter of what everyone else seems to know; i'm just a [fourth year] graphic design student.   
i spent a few hours browsing the forums, especially the critique section, and i must say in that short amount of time i've learned a lot. i definitely feel like i hit the lottery!   
   
thanks!
author: jaci_core

comments.content:
ugh, it posted with the wrong subject.   
sorry.
